dialogueTree.title: Conceptualization: "They really have an interesting set..."
dialogueTree.text: They really have an interesting set up here. Like kids preparing for a school science fair. It's pretty neat.

links.title: You: "I hope I did stuff like this when I..."
links.text: I hope I did stuff like this when I was a kid.

links.title: Conceptualization: "I'm sure you did. You have an explo..."
links.text: I'm sure you did. You have an exploratory, creative streak -- just like them.

links.title: You: "Are we sure about this? Something s..."
links.text: Are we sure about this? Something smells fishy...

links.title: Conceptualization: "Nah, that's just the smell of healt..."
links.text: Nah, that's just the smell of healthy experimentation. And lots of chemicals.

links.title: You: ""Hey Andre, what's all this?" (Cont..."
links.text: "Hey Andre, what's all this?" (Continue.)

links.title: Andre: ""This? Oh, we're trying to see if w..."
links.text: "This? Oh, we're trying to see if we can come up with some cool new special effects to add to the visual aspect of our club experience..." He gestures toward the set-up proudly.

links.title: Noid: ""We tinker with things. Art, music...."
links.text: "We tinker with things. Art, music... chemistry."

links.title: You: ""Okay, sounds cool." (Nod along.)"
links.text: "Okay, sounds cool." (Nod along.)

links.title: Andre: ""Some chemicals when mixed can, you..."
links.text: "Some chemicals when mixed can, you know, change colour, or sort of -- blow up..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""BLOW UP! BLOW UP!" The young man w..."
links.text: "BLOW UP! BLOW UP!" The young man with the large head pumps his fist in the air.

links.title: Andre: ""Not, like, you know, in a dangerou..."
links.text: "Not, like, you know, in a dangerous way," he throws Egg Head an uneasy glance, "or, well, we're not going to do it in a dangerous way."

links.title: Andre: ""Besides, did you know that *smell..."
links.text: "Besides, did you know that *smell experiences* are all the rage now at the most forward-thinking venues?"

links.title: Acele: ""Very big in *art circles*." She lo..."
links.text: "Very big in *art circles*." She looks up for a moment.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, chemistry has many uses. In p..."
links.text: "Yes, chemistry has many uses. In police work, too," the lieutenant says, deadpan.

links.title: Andre: "The young man looks startled for a..."
links.text: The young man looks startled for a moment, but then flashes you his most winsome smile.

links.title: Andre: ""I hope you get to experience one o..."
links.text: "I hope you get to experience one of our light-smell shows sometime, sir," he says, nodding his blond, spiked head vigorously. "It'll be a blast."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Feel free to come back later and '..."
links.text: "Feel free to come back later and 'have a blast' with these exemplars of youthful avant-gardism. But we really need to return to the present now."

links.title: Andre: ""I hope you get to experience one o..."
links.text: "I hope you get to experience one of our light-smell shows sometime, sir," he says with a smile, nodding his blond, spiked head vigorously. "It'll be a blast."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: "The lead programmer turns to look a..."
links.text: The lead programmer turns to look at you for a moment, her gaze impassive, then returns to her work.

links.title: You: ""I'm not sure I'm buying what you'r..."
links.text: "I'm not sure I'm buying what you're selling. What kind of effects?"
